stack.description:
Contains primarily launch scripts and rviz config files to demonstrate SLAM (Simultaneous Localization and Mapping) using external packages gmapping, octomap, and rgbdslam.
Copyright 2011, 2012, 2013 Massachusetts Institute of Technology
This work is sponsored by the Office of the Assistant Secretary of Defense for Research and Engineering under Air Force Contract #FA8721-05-C-0002. Opinions, interpretations, conclusions and recommendations are those of the authors and are not necessarily endorsed by the United States Government.
stack.author: Nick Armstrong-Crews
